amendment.description: To provide for an enhanced domestic content requirement for navy shipbuilding programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 685 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 685 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Baldwin to Amendment SA 935. (consideration: CR S3449-3451) To provide for an enhanced domestic content requirement for navy shipbuilding programs.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 685 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Baldwin to Amendment SA 935.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 685 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
